__data__.text: This is Crowd Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 6；Arrive at CHIJMES plazas by 7:00；Move and wait orderly according to guidance by 8:00；Observe crowd density and adjust stopping position by 9:00；Continue moving and waiting within the plaza by 11:00；Take a short break and rest in a suitable spot by 12:00；Follow on-site guidance for further movement by 13:00；Adjust position based on congestion levels by 15:00；Remain in designated area and observe crowd flow by 17:00；Prepare to leave the plaza by 18:00
